attributes.action: Close schools during Covid waves in U.K.
attributes.additional_details: Protect children’s physical and mental and psychological health first and foremost as they are living in constant fear and stress worried they will get Covid at school and take Covid home
attributes.background: Close schools during all waves of Covid pandemic to stop spread in all schools throughout U.K. and wider communities thus reducing numbers, saving lives and protecting nhs from being overwhelmed

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Keep schools closed until Covid 19 is no longer a threat
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316404

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846
